caption.p: (A) Pedigree of study family. Â± represent segregation status of different individuals. (B) Segregation of NM_001190720: c.850C>T mutation in parents and recruited unaffected siblings. (C) Cartoons for IKBKB transcript and protein domains; arrows point to the position of mutated base. I in last protein's domain stand for I-kappa-kinase-beta NEMO binding domain. *Indicates nonsense mutation resulting in termination of translation (truncated protein).
